name: Othello (HES)
overview: The original challenging board-game of "OTHELLO", you can now play on your Nintendo system. It's a game of strategy and concentration to ultimately "outflank" your opponent. The object of the game is to flip your opponents discs to your colour, ending up with a majority of discs on the board bearing your colour. To "outflank" means to trap one or more of your opponents discs in the middle of two of yours. Three skill levels against the computer or a friend. For one or two players using pads.
